sentences.en: He castigated himself for being so stupid.
sentences.cn: 他责怪自己太笨。

sentences.en: He understands – he’s not stupid.
sentences.cn: 他明白——他又不笨。

sentences.en: He was carrying on about some stupid television series.
sentences.cn: 他喋喋不休地说着某个无聊的电视连续剧。

sentences.en: He was not stupid, just lazy.
sentences.cn: 他不笨，只是懒。

sentences.en: How could I have been so stupid?
sentences.cn: 我怎么会那么蠢？

sentences.en: I can’t believe Kate was stupid enough to get involved in this.
sentences.cn: 我简直不能相信凯特这么傻，会介入这件事情。

sentences.en: I couldn’t do it, and it made me feel stupid.
sentences.cn: 这件事我做不来，这让我感到自己很愚蠢。

sentences.en: I don't see the point in it really. It's just stupid.
sentences.cn: 我真的不理解这到底有什么意义，简直是愚蠢透顶。

sentences.en: I shall have words with these stupid friends of mine!
sentences.cn: 我真应该跟我这些愚蠢的朋友理论理论！

sentences.en: I wouldn't call it art. It's just stupid and tasteless.
sentences.cn: 我不认为这是艺术。它简直无聊透顶，毫无品位。

sentences.en: I'll never do anything so stupid again.
sentences.cn: 我再也不会做这种傻事了。

sentences.en: It was stupid of me to lose my temper.
sentences.cn: 我大发脾气，真是太愚蠢了。

sentences.en: It was stupid, just vandalism for the hell of it.
sentences.cn: 只是为了好玩而破坏公物是很愚蠢的行为。

sentences.en: It's incredible that Peter can behave with such stupid lack of feeling.
sentences.cn: 彼得行事如此麻木不仁，真是难以置信。

sentences.en: It's just dang stupid!
sentences.cn: 简直太愚蠢了！

sentences.en: No, stupid, don’t do it like that!
sentences.cn: 不，笨蛋，不要那样做！

sentences.en: stupid mistakes
sentences.cn: 愚蠢的错误

sentences.en: That was a stupid thing to say.
sentences.cn: 那样说可真傻。

sentences.en: The defence conceded stupid goals through sheer carelessness.
sentences.cn: 防守队员完全因为粗心大意而造成了无谓的失球。

sentences.en: What you did was unbelievably stupid.
sentences.cn: 你的所作所为真是愚蠢透顶。

sentences.en: Who cares about some stupid vacation?
sentences.cn: 谁在乎什么愚蠢的度假？

sentences.en: You stupid little bitch!
sentences.cn: 你这个愚蠢的小悍妇！

trans.tran_en: showing a lack of good sense or good judgment
an insulting way of talking to someone who you think is being stupid
